name: jquery-ui-numeric
description:
This widget allows you to turn any text 
      or number input box into a numeric "up/down" picker. 
      Users can use keyboard arrow keys or page up/down keys to adjust the number, 
      or they can click the up/down buttons that are added to the right of the input. 
      You are also able to format the way the number is displayed in the input 
      so that a specific numeric format is enforced.
